Description: On I-81 at mile marker 266.1 in the County of Shenandoah, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All south lanes are closed. Traffic backups are approximately 2.5 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On Rt. 609 North in the County of Powhatan, in the vicinity of Old Buckingham Rd; VA-13E/W, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 138.3 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On Rt. 639 in the County of Spotsylvania, in the vicinity of Leavells Ct; Rt. 2259N (Spotsylvania County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north through lanes are closed. The south through lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 74.7 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.

Description: On US-250 in the City of Richmond, in the vicinity of the ramp to I-95, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The east exit ramp is closed.
